name: 亚历克斯·利维纳利
name_full: 亚历克斯·利维纳利 Alex Livinalli
introduction: With a career that spans nearly two decades, actor Alex Livinalli is consistently elevating his performances across film and television.Livinalli will next be seen in Disney and Marvel's "Black Panther: Wakanda Forever," the highly anticipated sequel to the award-winning "Black Panther" (2018) from director Ryan Coogler. Livinalli joins the cast as 'Attuma,' the fearsome Talocan Warrior. In the film, the leaders of the kingdom of Wakanda fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T'Challa's (Chadwick Boseman) death. Livinalli stars alongside Letitia Wright, Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira, Winston Duke, Florence Kasumba, Dominique Thorne, Michaela Coel, Tenoch Huerta, Martin Freeman, and Angela Bassett. The film premieres globally in theaters on November 11th.Livinalli has appeared in many television series and feature films. Some of his most popular credits include "Ozark," "Longmire," "The Walking Dead," "American Horror Story," and "Alita: Battle Angel" among others.A native of Venezuela, Livinalli moved to the United States at 10 years old to live the American Dream. He is fluent in Spanish and English and also learned some Portuguese, Comanche, and Mayan for film projects. He attended Miami Dade College where he majored in Drama. In the following years, he worked on short films and student films, honing his craft, before booking his first series.
